mapper.select: select to_char(member_join, 'yyyy-MM-dd') JOIN, count(member_id) CNT from member where to_char(member_join, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between to_char(sysdate-6, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by member_id, to_char(member_join, 'yyyy-MM-dd') order by CNT desc

select * from ( select TMP.*, rownum rn from ( select R.recipe_title, count(R.recipe_title) CNT from recipe R inner join recipe_view RV on R.recipe_no = RV.recipe_view_no where to_char(RV.recipe_view_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by R.recipe_title order by CNT desc )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 5

select * from ( select TMP.*, rownum rn from ( select R.recipe_title, count(R.recipe_title) CNT from recipe R inner join recipe_like RL on R.recipe_no = RL.recipe_like_no where to_char(RL.recipe_like_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between to_char(sysdate-7, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by R.recipe_title order by CNT desc )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 5
